statements: DELETE FROM SecurityEquipmentInventory WHERE equipment_type = 'Camera' AND location = 'Hallway';
DELETE FROM SecurityEquipmentInventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND location = 'Main Office';
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE type = 'Motion' AND price < 100.00;
DELETE FROM security_cameras WHERE price > 1000 AND brand = 'Sony';
DELETE FROM sensors WHERE price < 500 OR type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM alarms WHERE enabled = false;
DELETE FROM alarms WHERE location = 'Main Lobby' AND enabled = false;
DELETE FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Room 101' AND price > 500.00;
